name: Deep in Dark (Demo)
description:
Overview

"Deep in Dark" is a single-player, first-person horror game. The player finds himself in a dark room with no idea how they got there.

Summary

The player finds himself in a dark room with no idea how they got there, its up to you to discover what is happening while trying to escape that place.

Language

English is supported.

French will be supported in future updates.

Controls

The game only supports the keyboard and mouse currently.

Controls are in the main menu under: Settings---Controls---Keyboard And Mouse.

Please Note

This Demo is a showcase of ideas and game's environment if you bought it, you will get the full game when it comes out. This demo could get closed and get replaced by the full game when I am done working on it.

If you bought this demo when it was payed you will be getting the full game for free.

Requirements

Windows is required to run the game with a descent machine.

Saving Progress

Your progress won't be saved in this demo since it doesn't require much time to finish. 

Feel free to contact me at: smoothgames.su@gmail.com

Have Fun!
